name: Snap N Grip
description: Snap 'n Grip multi-purpose wrench system is universal wrenches for all nuts and bolts. Efficient, practical and easy to use. Automatically fits the size and shape of nuts and bolts. This is a multipurpose tool that helps in tackling multiply sized wrenches on your own. The product comprises of a set of two different wrenches that suits all nuts and bolts.The practical tool adjusts itself according to the size of the bolts and with all systems of measurement. The set of two wrenches comprises of one small and one large wrench. Small wrench has a different-sized head on each end, while the large wrench has a single large head for bigger nuts and bolts.However, both can be used for all the different purposes irrespective of their size and shape, as these wrenches adapt themselves according to its usage. You can use snap n grip wrenches for tackling daily problems with taps, valves, pipes, lines, radiators, boilers, wheels, etc.

name: Glue gun
description: Heat up quickly, Includes 5 sticks (200mm/8), Maximum strength in 2 minutes, Easy squeeze trigger, Maintains constant temperature automatically
